testimonials.label: CLIENT SUCCESS STORIES
testimonials.title: What Our Clients Say
testimonials.subtitle: Real feedback from real clients who have launched successful applications with Aviniti
testimonials.testimonial_1_quote: Aviniti delivered our gym management app ahead of schedule and exceeded all expectations. The AI-powered features have revolutionized how we manage member engagement and retention.
testimonials.testimonial_2_quote: The office management solution from Aviniti has saved us countless hours every week. Their attention to detail and commitment to quality is unmatched in the industry.
testimonials.testimonial_3_quote: Our delivery app has been a game-changer for our business. Aviniti's team was professional, responsive, and delivered a product that our customers absolutely love.
testimonials.testimonial_4_quote: Working with Aviniti on our kindergarten management app was seamless. They understood our needs perfectly and created an intuitive platform that parents and teachers both love.

services.label: WHAT WE BUILD
services.title: Full-Stack Development, Powered by AI
services.subtitle: From mobile apps to AI integrations, we build complete digital solutions tailored to your business needs.

mobile-apps.name: Mobile Apps
mobile-apps.description: Cross-platform native apps that users love. From consumer apps to enterprise mobility, built for performance and reliability.
mobile-apps.technologies: React Native, Flutter, Swift, Kotlin, Firebase

web-applications.name: Web Applications
web-applications.description: Modern web platforms with SSR, PWA support, and cloud-native architecture. Built for performance at any scale.
web-applications.technologies: Next.js, React, TypeScript, Node.js, Firebase, Vercel
web-applications.industries: E-commerce · SaaS · Business Ops · Real Estate

ai-solutions.name: AI Solutions
ai-solutions.description: Custom AI integrations powered by Google Gemini. Intelligent chatbots, predictive analytics, and computer vision that transform your business.
ai-solutions.technologies: Google Gemini, TensorFlow, OpenAI, LangChain, Python

ui-ux-design.name: UI/UX Design
ui-ux-design.description: Research-driven design that converts. Beautiful, intuitive, and accessible interfaces from wireframes to production-ready components.
ui-ux-design.technologies: Figma, Adobe XD, Tailwind CSS, Framer, Storybook

why_choose.title: Why Companies Choose Aviniti
why_choose.subtitle: We combine speed, AI expertise, transparent pricing, and dedicated support.
why_choose.reason_1_description: From idea to app store in weeks, not months. Our streamlined process gets you to market faster.
why_choose.reason_2_description: We don't just build apps — we infuse them with AI from day one.
why_choose.reason_3_description: No hidden fees, no surprises. Get your AI-powered estimate before we start.
why_choose.reason_4_description: We don't disappear after launch. Continuous support and updates.

case_studies.label: SUCCESS STORIES
case_studies.title: Real Results, Real Impact
case_studies.subtitle: Discover how we've helped businesses transform their operations and achieve measurable success.
case_studies.case_1_excerpt: Built a custom mobile app with intelligent product recommendations that tripled conversion rates and increased average order value by 45%.
case_studies.case_2_headline: Streamlining Healthcare Operations with Smart Scheduling
case_studies.case_2_excerpt: Developed an AI-driven scheduling platform that reduced appointment no-shows by 65% and saved 20+ hours of administrative work weekly.
case_studies.case_3_headline: Optimizing Last-Mile Delivery with Route Intelligence
case_studies.case_3_excerpt: Created a logistics platform with AI-powered route optimization that cut delivery times by 40% and reduced fuel costs by 30%.

process.title: How We Work
process.subtitle: Our streamlined 6-step process takes you from idea to live app.
process.step_1_description: We understand your vision, goals, and target audience.
process.step_2_description: UI/UX design that delights users and drives engagement.
process.step_3_description: Clean, scalable code built with modern frameworks.
process.step_4_description: Rigorous QA to ensure a bug-free, polished experience.
process.step_5_description: Smooth deployment to app stores and cloud infrastructure.
process.step_6_description: Ongoing maintenance, updates, and dedicated assistance.
